name: Merman Art for Burning man 2021
description: The virtual world meets reality. The real art object that got a grant from Burning Man in 2021 was created by a group of artists who bring art to Nevada since 2015. A huge statue of a human, made of wood and metal floating in the desert. Merman's mission is to remind people that no matter how hard the times are, life is worth staying afloat. We choose not to surrender to the turbulent stream of life. Want to support us? Check other pieces. merman.worlak.com, instagram.com/merman_art
